title: ಮೂಕಜ್ಜಿಯ ಕನಸುಗಳು [Mookajjiya Kanasugalu]
description: Mookajjiya Kanasugalu (literally "the dreams of a mute grandmother") which tries to unveil the secrets of nature. The story revolves around a Granny and her visions on various aspects of life, from religion to social relationships. Its all about the conversations between granny and Subbaraya alias Subbanna that runs throughout the book on various issues that he encounters in his life. ~ from wikipedia
author: Kota Shivarama Karanth
